titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for preuention of abuses touching gunpowder and saltpeeter.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding unlicensed manufacture and sale; specifying 3 grades of powder--STC.
Dated at end: Westminster, the sixteenth day of Ianuary, in the twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 14; Steele notation: quan- by 2) the offen-.
The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
